lines.value: o le feagaiga fou gagana eleni ἡ kaivὴ δiaonkn he kainḕ diathḗke o le vaega tele lona lua o le loka le tusi paia kerisiano o le vaega muamua o le feagaiga tuai e faavae i luga o le tusi paia eperu
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o le talanoaina eleni o le feagaiga fou o aoaoga ma tagata o iesu faapea foi ma mea na tutupu i le uluaʻi senituri kerisiano
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: kerisiano manatu faatasi i laua uma le feagaiga tuai ma le feagaiga fou o ni tusitusiga paia paia

lines.name: Samoan

lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: uma tuuina faitauga ma fuaitau tuusao mai le feagaiga fou ua tuufaatasia foi i le tusitusiga kerisiano eseese

lines.value: ua uunaia feagaiga fou faalelotu faafilosofia ma faaupufai gaoioiga i kerisiano ma tuua se faailoga e le mafaagaloina i tusitusiga faatufugaga ma musika
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o le feagaiga fou o se tuufaatasiga o galuega kerisiano tusia i le tutusa gagana eleni o le uluaʻi senituri i taimi eseese e tusitala eseese oe sa soo iutaia anamua o iesu
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: i tu masani toetoe kerisiano uma i aso nei o le aofia ai o le feagaiga fou o tusi e 27.na tusia i le uluai tusitusiga i le uluaʻi senituri ma atonu o le lona lua o le era kerisiano e masani e talitonu i ai i koine eleni o le gagana masani o le meititerane sasae mai le conquests o alesana le sili 335-323 tlm seia oo i le 600 ad uma le galuega e iu lava ina amata ona tuufaatasia i le feagaiga fou e foliga mai ua tusia le silia faataamilo i le 150 tao le aofia ai o le feagaiga fou o

lines.value: a'oga amata o le igoa lenei e fa'aigoa ai a'oga amata po'o a'oga mo tamaiti e le'i amataina a latou a'oga tulagalua primary school).'ua tele a'oga amata ua fa'atuina i niu sila

lines.value: o tala o le vavau e iai lona fa'apapalagi po'o le fa'a'igilisi ma e fa'a'upu o myths and legends.'o tala o le vavau a samoa na masani ona tu'ugutu i aso anamua

lines.value: e pei la o le tala ia sina ma lana tama i le masina le tala i le mafua'aga o le igoa o samoa le tala ia tagaloaalagi le atua na foafoaina le lalolagi o tagata samoa ma le anoano o isi tala o le vavau

lines.value: o lotu o i totonu o samoa o le lotu katoliko lotu pope lotu e.f.k.s-ekalesia faapotopotoga samoa lotu mamona lotu metotisi lotu patipati ma tele o isi tama'ilotu kerisiano eseese ua faapena ona oo mai i totonu o samoa

lines.value: sa i ai nisi atua sa faapena ona tapuai ai samoa i aso ua mavae

lines.value: o le televise o se pusa e mafai ona pu'e faasalalauga mai le ea ona faaliliu ai lea ia faasalalauga i ata ma leo ina ia mafai ona matamata ai tagata.'o aso nei ua tele itu'aiga televise ma ua faigofie fo'i ona matamata tagata i ata ese'ese

lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o niu sila o se atunuu tamaoaiga ma se tamaoaiga maketi o loo pulea e le auina atu i fafo o oloa susu aano o manu ma le uaina faatasi ai ma tagata tafafao maimoa
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o niu sila a tamaoaiga o tupe maua maualuga ma tuu i se faavasegaga maualuga i faatusatusaga faava o malo o faatinoga o le atunuu e pei o le soifua maloloina aoaoga le saolotoga o le tamaoaiga ma le tulaga lelei o le olaga
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: i le gata i lea ua faatulagaina niu sila i 11 fono faaitulagi ma 67 pulega o le atunuu mo le faamoemoega o le malo i le lotoifale
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: le malo o le aofia ai foi le niu sila tokelau a teritori faalagolago le motu cook ma niue le tagata lava ia e pulea setete i faalapotopotoga saoloto ma niu sila ma le faalagolago ross o talosaga o le atunuu o niu sila i le anetatika
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o niu sila o se sui o le malo aufaatasi o le taupulega o malo anzus faalapotopotoga mo tamaoaiga galulue felagolagomai ma atinae fono o le pasefika ma asia ma le pasefika tamaoaiga galulue faatasi

lines.value: o le fa'amoemoe ina ia tala'i le tala lelei i atunu'u uma ae le'i toe afio fa'alua mai iesu
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o le papatisoga i le agaga paia e afua mai ona tautalatala lea i gagana ese'ese o le fa'amaufa'ailoga foi lea o le tatou fa'amoemoe i le malo o i le lagi
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o le papatisoga i le vai o se sauniga i le fa'amamaina o a tatou agasala ma le toe fa'aolaola po'o le fa'afouina o le olaga.o se sauniga e faia i le vai pei la o le vaitafe po'o le sami foi
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o le papatiso foi ua tatau ona papatisoina foi o ia i le agaga paia ma le vai ma na te papatisoina tagata i le suafa o le ali'i o iesu keriso
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o le tagata foi o lo'o sauni atu ina ia papatisoina e tatau ona punou lelei lava i totonu o le vai
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o le sauniga o le mulumuluina o vae na te fausiaina se mafutaga lotogatasi ma le ali'i o iesu
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o se fa'amanatuga foi lea ina ia aua ne'i galo e le tagata e tatau ona fa'avaeina i le alofa le amiotonu a le atua le loto maulalo le fa'amagaloga ma le loto auauna i le tasi ma le tasi
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o i latou uma ua papatisoina i le vai ua iai se aia tatau ona mulumuluina o latou vae i le suafa o iesu keriso
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: ma o se sauniga foi lea e mafai ona faia i so'o se mea ua lagona iai le tagata ona faia
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o le fa'amanatuga pa'ia o le sauniga lea e faamanatuina ai le maliu o lo tatou ali'i o iesu keriso
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: ua mafai ai o na tatou talia le tino ma le toto o lo tatou ali'i ma ua maua ai le so'otaga ma ia i na ia tatou maua ai le ola e fa'avavau ma fa'atutuina ai le aso mulimuli
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o lenei faamanatuga e tatau ona faia i aso uma e talafeagai ai
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o le aso sapati o le aso pa'ia ua fa'amanuiaina ma fa'apa'iaina e le atua
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: ua fa'amanatuina i le alofatunoa o le ali'i mo le fa'amanatuina of the foafoaga ma le fa'aolataga a le atua ma le fa'atuatuaga o le malologa i le ola e fa'avavau o le a o'o mai
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: " o iesu keriso o le upu na liutino tagata na maliu i le satauro mo le fa'aolataga o tagata agasala na toetu i le aso tolu talu ona maliu ma afio a'e ai i le lagi
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: ua na'o ia o le fa'aola o tagata le foafoaga o le lagi ma le lalolagi ma o ia o le atua moni
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: " o le tusi pa'ia e maua ai le feagaiga tuai ma le feagaiga fou ua fa'ala'ei'auina e le atua ua na pau lea o fa'amaumauga fa'aleatua moni,ma o le fua mo le soifua fa'akerisiano
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: " o le fa'aolataga e tu'uina mai lea i le alofa foa'i o le atua e ala mai i le fa'atuatua.e tatau i tagata e fa'atuatua ona faamoemoe i le agaga pa'ia e maua ai le uiga atua fa'amaoni ile atua ma alofa i tagata ola
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o le ekalesia sa fa'atuina e lo tatou ali'i e ala mai le agaga pa'ia i le taimi o le uaga mulimuli o le ekalesia tonu toefaatuina i le taimi fa'a aposetolo
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o le afio fa'alua mai o le ali'i o le a fa'ataunu'uina i le aso mulimuli pe a afio ifo o ia mai le lagi e fa'amasino le lalolagi o le auamiotonu ole'a latou maua le ola e fa'avavau ae o le auamioleaga ole'a fa'asalaina i latou e o'o i le fa'avavau
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o musika a samoa i aso anamua o fatuga na fatu e tagata samoa e ave tausoa ai le olaga po'o le soifua i na vaitaimi
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: faimai le mau a se tasi o ali'i su'esu'e i mea tau fatuga a samoa le ali'i siamani o siaosi palate george pratt e tele fatuga ese'ese a tagata samoa anamua
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o nisi o nei fatuga sa fa'afaigofie ai le aloga o a latou va'a folau o le sami e fai ma taimi e alo fa'atasi ai foe o nei va'a tetele e pei o alia fa'apena fo'i va'aalo ma isi va'a
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o le isi upu e masani ai tagata samoa o le upu pese.tasi lenei vaega taua e lelei fo'i ona malamalama i ai so'o se samoa
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o pese po'o fatuga fa'asamoa e tele lo latou aoga i le lalolagi o samoa fa'apena ma le tala'aga o tagata samoa
lines.name: Samoan

lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: e maua pago pago i le motu o tutuila
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o tagata samoa sa lauiloa tele i le folau i va'a i aso anamua.'olo'o iai tala mai anamua olo'o fa'amaumau ai le popoto o tagata samoa e folau mai lea motu i lea motu
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o se tasi o va'a na folau ai tagata samoa i aso anamua e ta'ua o le alia
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: e iai se pese samoa lauiloa na fatuina e malifa faleto'ese lemalu o vaiala ma lefaga olo'o fa'a'upu ai le popoto o samoa e folau i va'a.'o le igoa o lena pese o le samoa e lo'u atunu'u e pele i le loto e
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o manono o le motu i samoa e tu i le va o upolu ma savai'i

lines.value: a fa'apea e fia malaga i manono e o tagata i va'a laiti mai mulifanua

lines.value: na faiina le malo se fasotaiga tau telefoni i manono ma eletise 24 tula o le vaiaso
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o le tulaga tuai o manono sa te le eletise i le 6 i le afiafi ma pe i le 12 i le po

lines.value: ua manaia le vaaiga nei o manono ua e tele moli ola i le po e fa'amalama ai auala savali i le po
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: e leai se maile ma ta'avale poo se auala tele i manono
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: a fa'apea e te fiamalagaina i se mea i le motu e alu ai taua i le uila va'a poo le famolosi tino savali

lines.name: Samoan

lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: e matogofie manono ma o se mea taua i tanu e asi aua e ese tele mo
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o le iunivesite aoao o samoa e tu i le papaigalagala i vaivase apia i samoa
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: e to'atele tupulaga mai le pasefika ua a'o'oga ai i lenei iunivesite

lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o se tofa loloto lea na fa'ataunu'uina ai lenei fa'amoemoe ma tula'i mai ai se iunivesite a samoa lava ia
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o ofu o se tasi o tama'i motu i amerika samoa
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: mai le lomiga 1884 mataio 6:5 pe a e tatalo au ne'i e pei o tagata pepelo aua ua latou fia tutu ma tatalo i sunako ma fetaulaigaala ina ia iloa i latou e tagata
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: e moni ou te fai atu ia te outou ua maua e i latou lo latou taui

lines.value: talk about what is happening in your samoan community wherever you are on the globe
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: share any news interesting samoans and their achievements church youth groups womens groups fathers changing roles etc.'aua e te fefe e fa'ata'ita'i lau gagana samoa
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: ou te fiafia e fesoasoani atu ia te oe
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: dont be afraid to practise your samoan language here
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: i am happy to help you learn samoan on this page
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: if you want to begin a list of words that assist your understanding of matai chiefly language just help by writing down simple phrases that you want to learn
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: for example o a mai oe
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o fa'apefea mai oe
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: = how are you
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: [1 person] o a mai oulua
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o fa'apefea mai oulua
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: = how are you
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: [2 people] o a mai outou
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o fa'apefea mai outou
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: = how are you
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: [3 + people]
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o lenei itulau ua manatu e amata ona fa'atulaga ai suafa o tua'a o samoa na latou fatua pese samoa olo'o fa'amatala ai le lalolagi o samoa i aso anamua
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: afai e te iloa se tasi o nei fatupese taua fesoasoani mai e fau fa'atasi la tatou galuega i lenei itulau ina ia fa'amaumau ai se tala aua le tupulaga o le lumana'i o samoa
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: lisi o fatupese maiavatele pouono hunkin
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: composers of samoan songs or pese need to be recorded for all samoans and researchers in samoan issues and culture who are interested
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: many old samoan songs have been rerecorded by younger samoan artists and singing groups today but scant recognition have been given to acknowledging those who composed these songs
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: it is good and polite to acknowledge the source of the poetry the font of wisdom and the realm of the cultural riches of fa'asamoa that these songs contain and the eras that they represent yet have been changed in word in pronunciation poor especially by groups of samoans born overseas but do not take the trouble and pride to pronounce the samoan words properly and in the editing unconsciously often by some individual or group performers over the years without realising that the power of creation by the composers is an act to be respected and deferred to
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: for that reason please if you speak samoan refer to pese and fatupese to add your knowledge of fatupese already listed
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: ==manu samoa== o le ta'aloga lakapi e fiafia tele i ai tagata o samoa
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: o se ta'aloga ua lausilafia ai samoa i le lalolagi atoa
lines.name: Samoan

lines.value: ua mafua lenei mea ona e le gata ina lelei le ta'a'alo a tama samoa i niu sila ae ua lauiloa fo'i le aulakapi a samoa e ta'ua o le manu samoa
lines.name: Samoan
